Key Match Events: Corey Seager's early home run helped Texas grab the initiative
Texas led 4-2 in the third innings and they hammered in four more runs in the top of the fourth
Post-Match Reflections: The Rangers will have the opportunity to get their first World Series by playing four of the seven games at their home stadium in Arlington
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rangers are the oldest club in Major League Baseball to not have a World Series to their name
